subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: On the verge of passing Coach Dean Smith for the most career wins in N.C.A.A. Division I men’s basketball, Bob Knight has no regrets about how he has conducted himself on or off the basketball court.
snippet: On the verge of passing Coach Dean Smith for the most career wins in N.C.A.A. Division I men’s basketball, Bob Knight has no regrets about how he has conducted himself on or off the basketball court.
